archimate:Requirement.name: ISA-95-4: Job Control
archimate:Requirement.documentation:
Title: OPC 10031-4: ISA-95-4 Job Control Scope: This document defines the OPC UA companion specification for ISA-95 Job Orders, ISA-95 Job Responses, and access to queued, executing, and completed job order status and responses.
Version 2.0 of this specification has been updated with breaking changes; in that it is not compatible with version 1.0 of the specification. Thus, this specification defines a new namespace, allowing an older application to support both models if required. Version: 2.0.0 Date: 2024-01-31 Reference: http://opcfoundation.org/UA/ISA95-JOBCONTROL_V2/
